channel.title: Need someone to help me host my server!
channel.description:
I am a kind of skilled coder and have been working on this source for probably a month maybe its source was project-exile and i really want to get it public but one problem, cant afford vps and cant host because isp blocks port forwarding if interested add me on skype or message me on mopar name is justin.l.oglesby on skype [Features] Has 12 working summoning specials, mostly ones i found important to add Take bob works for storing summoning npcs Legit perfect pking Custom staff list Help button that sends request to staff so staff can help players whenever they need it. Tons of new items to make server alot more interesting 100% eco server All curses 100% Tons of bosses Server tasks with rewards [kind of like quests]
[here is some pics] My custom staff list [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/33uqrv8.png[/img] Lots of new items [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/15vwvp.png[/img] Custom storm of armadyl [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1ibuhf.png[/img] Help request sent to staff [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/35kir6d.png[/img] Take B.O.B [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/33v21qo/5]View My Video[/URL]

item.title: Need someone to help me host my server!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

RandQm:

No requests for hosters

True! and he has try himself to portforward with portforward.com for a tut and I’m on skype and everything looks okay but they problem is, is that he called his isp and they doesn’t allow portforwarding.

QWEST

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to help me host my server!

item.title: Need someone to help me host my server!
item.dc:creator: @justinleeoglesby justinleeoglesby
item.description:
@justinleeoglesby wrote:

I am a kind of skilled coder and have been working on this source for probably a month maybe its source was project-exile and i really want to get it public but one problem, cant afford vps and cant host because isp blocks port forwarding if interested add me on skype or message me on mopar name is justin.l.oglesby on skype
[Features]
Has 12 working summoning specials, mostly ones i found important to add
Take bob works for storing summoning npcs
Legit perfect pking
Custom staff list
Help button that sends request to staff so staff can help players whenever they need it.
Tons of new items to make server alot more interesting
100% eco server
All curses 100%
Tons of bosses
Server tasks with rewards [kind of like quests]

[here is some pics]
My custom staff list

Lots of new items

Custom storm of armadyl

1ibuhf.png774×550

Help request sent to staff

Take B.O.B
